topic.name: Graphic Asset Management & Presentation

objectives.sub_topic_name: File Formats (JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, SVG)

objectives.objective_text: Recall that big pictures take up more space.
Observe pixels on a TV screen up close.
Ask permission to use a picture.
Cite a source for an image.
Defend the right to intellectual property.
Summarize a Pie Chart (parts of a whole).
Explain the X and Y axis labels.
Defend the truthfulness of the visualization.
Put one picture on a slide.
Stand up and talk about the slide.
Summarize the rule: Don't read off the slide.

objectives.objective_text: Defend the need for archival formats (TIFF).

objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the requirements for large-format printing.

Synthesize ethical sourcing with creative remixing.
Create a chart from class data.
